name: Apple
description: A sweet red or green fruit.

name: Banana
description: A long yellow fruit.

name: Orange
description: A citrus fruit known for its vitamin C content.

name: Strawberry
description: A red fruit with a juicy texture and sweet flavor.

name: Grape
description: A small, juicy fruit often eaten in bunches, available in red, green, and black varieties.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a spiky exterior and sweet interior.

name: Mango
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Blueberry
description: A small, blue fruit often used in desserts and smoothies.

name: Watermelon
description: A large fruit with a green rind and sweet, red flesh, perfect for summer.

name: Peach
description: A sweet fruit with a fuzzy skin and juicy flesh.

name: Pear
description: A sweet fruit with a rounded bottom and tapering top, available in several varieties.

name: Cherry
description: A small, round fruit with a pit in the middle, often red or dark red.

name: Plum
description: A fruit with a smooth skin and sweet, juicy flesh, available in red, purple, and yellow varieties.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, brown fruit with green flesh and tiny black seeds.

name: Lemon
description: A sour, yellow citrus fruit used for flavoring and in beverages.

name: Lime
description: A small, green citrus fruit known for its sour taste, often used in cooking and beverages.

name: Raspberry
description: A small, red or black berry with a sweet-tart flavor.

name: Blackberry
description: A small, dark purple to black fruit with a sweet and slightly tart flavor.

name: Cantaloupe
description: A melon with a rough, netted skin and sweet orange flesh.

name: Honeydew
description: A melon with a smooth, pale green rind and sweet, green flesh.
